Languages.Language 1: Understands the languages of its creator but can not speak

Equipment Actions.Action 1: Slam, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 16 Bludgeoning and can reduce the target's HP

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Golem makes 2 Slam attacks
Other Actions.Action 2: Haste, The Golem's malleable form speeds up, making it more difficult to hit, granting advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it can use its Slam attack as a Bonus Action

Abilities.Ability 1: Acid Absorption, The Golem absorbs acid damage and heals from it
Abilities.Ability 2: Berserk, When the Golem has sustained enough damage, it begins to go berserk, attacking whichever creature is closest to it
Abilities.Ability 3: Immutable Form, The Golem is immune to spells that would alter its form
Abilities.Ability 4: Magic Resistance, The Golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 5: Magic Weapons, The Golem's weapon attacks are magical

Damage Immunities.Damage 4: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with Adamantine weapons
